translations: 洋泾滨语；混杂语言；事务

phrs.translation: 洋泾浜英语（英语与其他语言混杂形成的语言）

sentences.sentence: Pidgins exist in all parts of the world, with particular prominence in the western Pacific Rim and Atlantic coastal regions and more generally in regions that have been colonized.
sentences.translation: 洋泾滨语存在于世界上所有的地区，尤其是西太平洋边缘和大西洋沿岸地区，更常见于已被殖民的地区。
